column4: Hello all.  I'm having some trouble getting my external harddrive on my Ubuntu machine shared out to the windows machines on my network
I share it out, but windows tells me I don't have permission to view files.  When I look at the permissions on the external hd, I see rwx------ and it looks like the external is not owned by root
haha Sorry here's the exact command: chmod -R 777 /media/<insert drive name here>
